snippet.title: Wizards Of Alamar Promo
snippet.description:
Role playing wizardry at its finest! 
This fast-paced action-packed game will have you begging for more. Collect artifacts and explore quests that not only expands, but taxes your magical prowess. Unlock a multitude of puzzles and fight through the never ending onslaught of enemies as you search for the Lost Keys of Alamar. Courage, wisdom and sheer grit is what you need to prevail. 
Do you have what it takes to defeat your enemies and collect the keys before Van Em-Minroe?

Free Lite Version:  
https://xandzproductionsllc.itch.io/wizardsofalamar-lite

Support us on Patreon. 
https://www.patreon.com/WizardsOfAlamar

Support us on Subscribestar
https://www.subscribestar.com/wizardsofalamar

Website: https://xandzproductions.com
